testcase.classname: validation of Adactin hotel web application for order Id generation

testcase.system-out: Given user Launch the adactin hotel web application.........................passed When user enter valid username and password.................................passed And click the login button..................................................passed Then verify user able to view the search hotel page.........................passed When Seclect valid Location,valid Hotel name,valid Room type................passed And click the search button.................................................passed Then verify user able to view the next hotel page...........................passed When click on rodio button and continue button..............................passed Then verify user able to view the Book A Hotel page.........................passed When Enter the Valid First Name,valid Last Name,valid Billing Address and vaid Credit card Number.passed And Select valid Credit card type,Valid Expiry date and valid CVV number....passed And click on the Book Now button............................................passed Then verify user able to view the Booking Confirmation page should be displayed.passed When print the order number.................................................passed Then order number should be printed.........................................passed
